entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
